About Me

Hi I am Xinmai Xuan,

A young programmer, not that young actually. Takes coding as both the job and hobby. Passionate about exploring and learning various new technologies.

Get a little confused about both the World and Self. May pause or rest for some time, always chasing for better life and self-achievement. Interested in Distrubuted Systems and Deep Learning.

Data Analyst Intern, GUO QIU HUI(国球汇), Beijing China

2018 JUNE — 2018 AUG

1. To improve satisfaction and increase number of games played in limited time. Leveraged SPSS to analyze participant engagement by comparing win rates. All participant were divided into groups based on results. Waiting time was reduced by 20% and participant satisfaction was improved to 96%. 2. Tableau was used to visualize participant-position correlations, facilitating smarter venue planning. A significant 33% uptick in event attendance was led.
